text: The Caruthersville Bridge is a cantilever bridge carrying Interstate 155 and U.S. Route 412 over the Mississippi River between Caruthersville, Missouri and Dyersburg, Tennessee. It is the only bridge that connects Missouri and Tennessee. The bridge cost $25,800,000 and was opened on December 1, 1976. ==References== Category:Buildings and structures in Missouri Category:Transport in Missouri Category:Bridges in Tennessee
title: Caruthersville Bridge
